snippet: Unless the Jets overcome long odds Sunday to make the playoffs, Mark Sanchez could be forced to confront significant changes.
abstract: Young football career of New York Jets quarterback Mark Sanchez has been a portrait of stability, but if Jets fail to make playoffs he could be forced to confront an uncomfortable and unfamiliar reality that includes significant changes.
lead_paragraph: Unless the Jets overcome long odds Sunday to make the playoffs, Mark Sanchez could be forced to confront significant changes.

headline.seo: Jets’ Sanchez, Used to Stability, May Soon Confront Uncertainty
headline.main: Sanchez, Used to Stability, May Soon Confront Uncertainty
headline.print_headline: Sanchez, Used to Stability, May Soon Confront Uncertainty
